A set of tools to ease XWiki interaction on Android platform.
= Some informations =
* maven android builder: http://code.google.com/p/maven-android-plugin/ * android library projects: ** http://developer.android.com/guide/developing/eclipse-adt.html#libraryProject ** http://androidblogger.blogspot.com/2010/09/android-library-projects.html * Google I/O 2010 - Android REST client applications: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xHXn3Kg2IQE
= Tools = == XWiki-REST client ==
Android version of http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/platform/core/trunk/xwiki-rest/xwiki-rest-model/
== Synchronization daemon ==
Install a daemon application which synchronizes applications data with an XWiki instance (database<->XWiki model)
== XWiki client UI ==
Android application UI version of XWiki viewers/editors
